column1: "living room, contemporary style, pure white color wallpaper, with smooth matte texture, pale oak color flooring, with natural wood grain pattern, beige leather modular sofa, round light wood coffee table, abstract patterned rug, large potted plant, framed minimalist art on wall"

"Living room, modern style, off-white color wallpaper, with smooth matte finish, light beige color flooring, with natural oak wood pattern, light beige fabric sectional sofa, white open-shelving unit with decorative items, light beige and white area rugs, large black-framed windows"

"Living room, contemporary style, warm white color wallpaper, with smooth matte finish, light natural oak color flooring, with wide plank wood pattern, off-white upholstered sofa, geometric beige stone coffee table, off-white cozy area rug, minimalist white armchair, contemporary built-in white shelves, tall greenery in a white planter"
